description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. 23 lines per page. Written by one hand in a very clear medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Dark cream paper with laid (and chain?, see fol. 302) lines visible. Collation notes (collation statements, see fol. 2b, 70Ab, 125a, 130a, where it is stated that this was copied from a copy by Mawlānā Khusraw Shāhī). The copyist is commenting on his exemplar (see fol. 12b). Foliation using Arabic numerals in the middle of the upper margin. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals in the left corner of the lower margin. The quires are numbered (see fol. 16a); catchword on the verso of each leaf. Fol. 143 is a later replacement. Some leaves are mended, with the text missing often re-written on the repair. From fol. 181 on, hole in each leaf (the text missing is re-written on the repair up to fol. 269, from there on, loss of text). Copied in Shawwāl 677 according to colophons (fol. 12b and 175v).
author: Avicenna, 980-1037
abstract: Collection of philosophical texts, mainly from Avicenna and al-Fārābī.
alternative: Rasāʼil Ibn [Sīnā] wa-al-Fār[ābī ... wa-] al-Rāzī [...] wa-Aflā[...].
contents: 1. fol. 1a: [Table of contents].
2. fol. 1b-2b: [al-]Khuṭab wa-al-taḥmīdāt / Avicenna.
3. fol 3b-12b: Risālah ilá Abī Rayḥān Muḥammad al-Bīrūnī / Avicenna.
4. fol. 13b-17a: Maqālah fī khaṭaʼ man qāla inna shayʼan huwa jawhar wa-ʻaraḍ maʻan / Avicenna.
5. fol. 17b-68a: Kitāb al-Mubāḥathāt / Avicenna.
6. fol. 68b-70Ab: Ajwibah ʻan ʻashr masāʼil / Avicenna.
7. fol. 70Ab-71a: Risālah fī al-radd ʻalá man qāla inna al-insān talāshā wa-faniya / Aflāṭūn.
8. fol. 71b-89b: Iḥṣāʼ al-ʻulūm / Fārābī.
9. fol. 90b-93a: Maqālah fī qawānīn ṣināʻat al-shuʻarāʼ / Fārābī.
10. fol. 93b-125a: al-Kitāb fī mabādiʼ ārāʼ ahl al-madīnah al-fāḍilah / Fārābī.
11. fol. 125b-130a: Tafsīr li-baʻḍ suwar kalām Allāh / Avicenna.
11a. fol. 125b-128a: Tafsīr sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ / Avicenna.
11b. fol. 128a-129b: Tafsīr sūrat al-Falaq / Avicenna.
11c. fol. 129b-130a: Tafsīr sūrat al-Nās / Avicenna.
12. fol. 130b-142a: Kitāb Taḥqīr al-ladhdhāt / Fakhr al-Dīn al-Rāzī.
13. fol. 142b-149a: Risālat al-Firdaws / Avicenna.
14. fol. 149b-156a: al-Siyāsah / Avicenna.
15. fol. 156b-158b: Risālat al-arzāq / Avicenna.
16. fol. 159a-160a: Risālah fī īḍāḥ barāhīn mustanbaṭah fī masāʼil ʻawīṣah / Avicenna.
17. fol. 160b-175b: Kitāb Mukhtaṣar Anūlūṭīqā al-ūlá / Fārābī.
18. fol. 176a-177a: Risālah fī ḥarakat al-kull / Alexander of Aphrodisias.
19. fol. 177b-266a: Taʻlīqāt / Avicenna.
20. fol. 266b-270a: Kitāb fī ibṭāl aḥkām al-nujūm / Fārābī.
21. fol. 270b-293b: Kitāb fī al-ārāʼ al-ṭabīʻīyah allatī taqūl bihā al-ḥukamāʼ / Pseudo-Plutarchus.
22. fol. 294a-295a: al-Maqālah fī al-jihah allatī yaṣiḥḥu ʻalayhā al-qawl fī aḥkām al-nujūm / Fārābī.
23. fol. 295b-305a: Risālah ilá al-Iskandar fī al-ʻālam wa-al-makhlūqāt [De mundo] / Pseudo-Aristotle.
24. fol. 305b-310b: Sharḥ Waṣāyā Fūthāghūras al-faylasūf.
extent: i, 311 leaves, i : paper ; 240 x 160 (175 x 115) mm. bound to 242 x 170 mm.
provenance: Ownership statement on fol. 3a. Ownership stamp of ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Riḍā ibn Mūsá ibn Jaʻfar Kāshif al-Ghiṭāʼ (1850-1931) in violet ink dated 1334 [1915 or 16] on several leaves. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: Ownership statement on fol. 3a. Ownership stamp of ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Riḍā ibn Mūsá ibn Jaʻfar Kāshif al-Ghiṭāʼ (1850-1931) in violet ink dated 1334 [1915 or 16] on several leaves. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Avicenna, 980-1037
subject: Āl Kāshif al-Ghiṭāʼ, ʻAlī—Library
binding_note: Red leather over paper pasteboards with a blind-tooled outer frame.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
